verbs.description: [ARG0: The media] [V: continues] [ARG1: to fall down on the job] [ARGM-TMP: when it comes to reporting the dangerous bombardment of lies the Trump administration is subjecting us to day after day] .
[ARG1: The media] continues to [V: fall] [ARGM-DIR: down] [ARG4: on the job] when it comes to reporting the dangerous bombardment of lies the Trump administration is subjecting us to day after day .
The media continues to fall down on the job [ARGM-TMP: when] it [V: comes] [ARG1: to reporting the dangerous bombardment of lies the Trump administration is subjecting us to day after day] .
[ARG0: The media] continues to fall down on the job when it comes to [V: reporting] [ARG1: the dangerous bombardment of lies the Trump administration is subjecting us to day after day] .
The media continues to fall down on the job when it comes to reporting the dangerous bombardment of [V: lies] the Trump administration is subjecting us to day after day .
The media continues to fall down on the job when it comes to reporting the dangerous bombardment of lies the Trump administration [V: is] subjecting us to day after day .

The media continues to fall down on the job when it comes to reporting the dangerous bombardment of lies [ARG0: the Trump administration] is [V: subjecting] [ARG1: us] [ARG2: to] [ARGM-TMP: day after day] .
